query: SELECT id, name, image FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%PlayStation%' OR name LIKE '%Xbox%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user q8Ed9efAHcuZDzr.root --database iVAPtUQGMwL6qxGuVbNjoM --execute SELECT id, name, image FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%PlayStation%' OR name LIKE '%Xbox%';
